clock.docs:
One of `8MHZ`, `16MHZ` or `20MHZ`. Clock crystal used on the MCP2515 device. Defaults to `8MHZ`.

*See also: [MCP2515 Component](https://esphome.io/components/canbus.html#id3)*

LOOPBACK.docs: Loopback mode can be used to just test you spi connections to the device

mode.docs:
Operation mode. Default to `NORMAL`
  * `NORMAL`: Normal operation
  
  * `LOOPBACK`: Loopback mode can be used to just test you spi connections to the device
  
  * `LISTENONLY`: only receive data
  
  

*See also: [MCP2515 Component](https://esphome.io/components/canbus.html#id3)*

cs_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: Is used to tell the receiving SPI device when it should listen for data on the SPI bus. Each device has an individual `CS` line. Sometimes also called `SS`.

*See also: [MCP2515 Component](https://esphome.io/components/canbus.html#id3)*
